translations: n．破产者：因无法偿还债务而被宣告破产的个人或企业。
· The government has a plan to help bankrupts get back on their feet.
政府有一个帮助破产者重新站起来的计划。
v．使破产：导致个人或企业无法偿还债务而宣告破产。

sentences.sentence: In total, 80% of bankrupts are men.
sentences.translation: 总体来看，有80%的破产者为男性。

sentences.sentence: The bankrupts and the creditors are usually in competing position for respective interests.
sentences.translation: 破产者和债权人在各自的利益上通常处于竞争的状态。

sentences.sentence: Most bankrupts will be in the 650 area - if they behave themselves - within two years of bankruptcy.
sentences.translation: 多数破产者将是在650个区域中-，如果他们表现-在二年破产内。
